Key Match Events: Andrés Giménez hit a walk-off single in the 10th inning to clinch a playoff berth for the Cleveland Guardians
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt, the first-year manager of the Cleveland Guardians, was presented with a championship belt by catcher Austin Hedges
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians have a chance to possibly end baseball's longest active World Series drought, dating to 1948
Others: The Twins, who are trying to hold on to a wild card, only got three hits and fell into a tie with Detroit for the final spot
